mapper.insert: insert into programs(programsid , programsname , addtime ) values(#{programsid} , #{programsname} , #{addtime} )
mapper.update: update programs set programsname=#{programsname} , addtime=#{addtime} where programsid=#{programsid}
mapper.select: select a.* from programs a order by programsid desc
select a.* from programs a where programsid=#{programsid} order by programsid desc

select a.* from programs a where 1=1
and a.programsname like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{programsname}, '%'))
and a.addtime like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{addtime}, '%'))
